All Classes

Class Description
Activity
This class handles the information about an Activity object.
ActivityRegister
This class creates a register that handles Activity objects.
AppPanel
This is the panel in the frame that contains pretty much all of the components in the GUI.
Buffer<T>
Buffer class
Buffer<T>
Buffer class
ClientCommunicationController
This class manages the communication between the Client classes and the Server classes.
ClientController
This class manages the logic for the Client and controls the data flow.
LogInFrame  
LogInPanel  
MainFrame
This class starts the Login window and then awaits the user's input, and finally starts the main GUI.
MainPanel  
ReceiverServer
This class creates a thread pool and handles the communication from the Client.
SenderServer
This class creates a thread pool and handles the communication to the Client.
ServerController
This class handles the logic of the in and out coming objects from the clients.
SocketStreamObject
This class handles a socket and the input/output streams.
StartClient
This class creates the ClientController object and starts the client.
StartServer
This class creates a server-object and starts the server.
User
This class handles the information about a user-object.
UserRegister
This class handles all the user objects.
UserTimer
This class handles the information for a user's timer.
UserType
